title: How to Write a Backend the Worst Way﹕ Creation of GoREST | by Mostafa Qanbaryan
description: Creating GoREST has taken about a month so far (though I haven’t worked on it full-time - I’m counting from the first commit). Because of that, I’ve written this article to prevent others from making the same mistakes that took a considerable amount of time and effort to fix.
cntitle: 如何以最糟糕的方式编写后端：GoREST 的创建 | 作者：Mostafa Qanbaryan
cndescription: 创建 GoREST 到目前为止花了一个月左右的时间（虽然我不是全职开发，我从第一次提交开始算起）。因此，我写了这篇文章，以防止其他人犯同样的错误，这些错误花费了大量的时间和精力来修复。
